mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( name, explain, item_category, base_stock, sales_volume, detail_img, item_group_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{explain}, #{itemCategory}, #{baseStock}, #{salesVolume}, #{detailImg}, #{itemGroupId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name = IFNULL( #{name}, name ), explain = IFNULL( #{explain}, explain ), item_category = IFNULL( #{itemCategory}, item_category ), base_stock = IFNULL( #{baseStock}, base_stock ), sales_volume = IFNULL( #{salesVolume}, sales_volume ), detail_img = IFNULL( #{detailImg}, detail_img ), item_group_id = IFNULL( #{itemGroupId}, item_group_id ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(item_id) as item_id FROM item
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item WHERE item_group_id IN ( SELECT item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} )
SELECT name, sales_volume FROM item WHERE item_group_id IN ( SELECT seller_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} ) ORDER BY sales_volume DESC

SELECT * FROM item WHERE item_category = #{room} AND item_group_id IN ( SELECT item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} ) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize}, #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM item WHERE item_category = #{flight} AND item_group_id IN ( SELECT item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} ) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM item WHERE item_category = #{room} AND item_group_id IN ( SELECT item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} )
SELECT count(*) FROM item WHERE item_category = #{flight} AND item_group_id IN ( SELECT item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} )

SELECT * FROM item JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(start_date) start_date, AVG(price) price_per_day, AVG(discount_price) discount_per_day, SUM(price) total_price, SUM(discount_price) total_discount_price FROM item_schedule WHERE DATEDIFF(DAY, start_date, #{startDate}) <= 0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, end_date, #{endDate}) >= 0 GROUP BY item_id ) USING (item_id) WHERE item_group_id = #{itemGroupId}
